name: isochrone
description:
The isochrone command creates polygons showing areas reachable within specified travel times from a starting point. This is useful for:

- Accessibility analysis
- Service area planning
- Real estate analysis
- Urban planning

Multiple time intervals can be generated at once for comparison.

options.--mode, -m: Travel mode: walk, bike, drive (default: walk)

output:
GeoJSON FeatureCollection with one polygon per time interval.
Each polygon has properties:
- time_minutes: Travel time for this isochrone
- mode: Travel mode used
- origin: Starting coordinates
